stadium.name: The Cliffside Pitch
stadium.description: A perilous, windswept field built next to the town's lighthouse. There is no ocean-side barrier, and the wind is notoriously unpredictable. The tusk-like lighthouse is the only landmark.

stats.pregame_ritual: Telling each other exaggerated lies about their own strength.
Stretching their hamstrings for exactly seven minutes.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Adjusting their codpiece with theatrical importance.
Getting a teammate to pour a bucket of cold water over their head.
Muttering a nonsensical rhyme to ward off bad spirits.
Filing down a single fingernail into a sharp point.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Wearing a necklace of polished river stones.
Stretching their hamstrings for exactly seven minutes.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.

stadium.name: The Oakmaul Grounds
stadium.description: Built over the site of the final battle during the liberation of Hafting now rises The Oakmaul Grounds‚Äîpart arena, part monument. The central oak still bears the burn scars of the final battle. Troll ball here feels more like ritual than sport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Wiggling their fingers in a complex, magical-looking pattern.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Organizing a small betting pool on who will score first.
Asking the Trollball for advice, and pretending to listen to its response.
Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Anointing their forehead with morning dew.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL PRE-GAME REPORT üéôÔ∏è

**Good evening, Trollball maniacs!** This is your favorite demon announcer, **Nok the Corrupter**, coming to you LIVE from the perilous edge of the world‚Äî**The Cliffside Pitch** in Southport! üåäüå¨Ô∏è Can you hear that wind howling? Or is that just the players screaming in anticipation? We‚Äôve got a real barn-burner tonight as the visiting **Greenwatch** take on the hometown heroes, **The Southport Narwhals**! The salt spray is heavy, the drop is steep, and the jagged rocks below are hungry for clumsy athletes!

Let‚Äôs talk about our visitors, **The Greenwatch**. Now, they hail from Hafting and align themselves with **The Wardens**. Yeah, yeah, I know, *Sir Randy* and his "fancy bow" and *Falric* the thief. BOO! üëé But don't let their goody-two-shoes friends fool you; these players are weirdos! I just watched **Madea Mensch** tie his own bootlaces together and hop to the starting line like a deranged bunny. And **Rese Halpern**? She‚Äôs over there taking deep, passionate sniffs of her own dirty socks from last week! If that stench doesn't knock out the opposition, nothing will! üß¶ü§¢

And here come the hosts, **The Southport Narwhals**! They represent the icy grip of **Grimfrost**. They‚Äôve got **King Nezmear** cheering them on, but let's be real, the only royalty I respect in the north is **Elizabeef the Werecow**. üêÑüëë The Narwhals look ready to defend their lighthouse! I see **Loralyn Lyndy** adjusting their codpiece with the pomp and circumstance of a royal coronation‚Äîvery important business! And keep an eye on **Torey Dannye**; he‚Äôs standing perfectly still, listening to the wind. Probably asking it which bone he‚Äôs going to break first! üå™Ô∏èüëÇ

It‚Äôs going to be wet, it‚Äôs going to be windy, and by the Ebon Gate, it‚Äôs going to be VIOLENT! The Healers are prepping their bandages, the fans are drunk on cheap ale, and I am ready to see some suffering! **LET'S PLAY TROLLBALL!** ü©∏üèàüì¢
postGame:
# üéôÔ∏è POST-GAME CARNAGE REPORT üéôÔ∏è

**HOLY OSTERRA!** Put the children to bed and mop up the blood, because that was a MASSACRE! The final whistle has blown at the Cliffside, and the silence from the home crowd is sweeter than a siren's song! **The Greenwatch** marched into the gale-force winds and delivered a crushing, bone-shattering **4-0 SHUTOUT** against the Southport Narwhals! üü¢üö´

The game started with a flurry of limbs and incompetence as everyone tried to find their footing on the rocky turf. We saw missed tackles left and right, but then **Nobe Haukom** decided to stop playing nice. WHAM! Nobe connected with **Braden Gaile** like a battering ram, sending the Narwhal straight to the dirt with the first major INJURY of the night! That is how you say hello in Trollball, folks! üí•üöë

But the Greenwatch was just getting warmed up! **Darin Berliner**‚Äîoh, you beautiful maniac‚Äîwent on a one-person crusade of pain! First, Darin obliterated **Blanc Fantasia**, leaving them counting seagulls in the sky. And before the ref could even blink, Darin turned around and snapped **Torey Dannye** in half! Two injuries in a row! The Narwhals were dropping like flies in a frost! ‚ùÑÔ∏èüòµ

Southport tried to rally! They really did! **Cibis Areta** managed to find the ball and looked toward the goal from Center Field. The crowd gasped... and **WIDE!** A total miss! Maybe too much of that cold water ritual froze her brain? üßäü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Capitalizing on the failure, The Greenwatch struck back! **Herriott Dhiren**, eyes wide from chewing that bitter root, launched a rocket from Home Field. **SCORES!** Two points on the board! üèπ‚öΩ

The bleeding didn't stop there! Before the half could end, **Troy Jorgan**‚Äîwho I swear was whispering secrets to the ball all game‚Äîlined up another shot from distance. The wind howled, the ocean roared, but the ball flew true! **ANOTHER TWO POINTS!** 4-0 Greenwatch! The Narwhals looked absolutely lost in their own lighthouse's shadow! üïØÔ∏èüìâ

**HALFTIME** saw our overworked Healers earning their paychecks. **Sand Denys** and **Nariko Javed** were casting spells and slapping faces, trying to get the bodies back upright. But once the second half started? pure chaos returned! We saw **Salahi Bushey** throw a wild pass that got SNATCHED by **Cilurzo Sochor**! An interception! A spark of hope for Southport? ü¶Ö‚ö°

**ABSOLUTELY NOT!** The Greenwatch took that interception personally! **Verne Methuselah** decided it was time to shine and absolutely CRUSHED **Fineman Dolhenty**. Folded them like a piece of origami! And while **Crescint Sonia** tried to salvage some pride by taking out **Goldenberg Rimola**, the Greenwatch defense was harder than a dwarven bagel! ü•Øüß±

Then came the fury of **Salahi Bushey**. Angry about the turnover, Salahi went BERZERK! First, Salahi tackled **Cibis Areta** into next week! CRACK! And not satisfied with just one victim, Salahi hunted down **Cilurzo Sochor** and sent them to the shadow realm too! Two injuries back-to-back! Nok the Corrupter gives that a standing ovation! üëèüòà

The hits kept coming right down to the wire! **Madea Mensch** laid a devastating tackle on **Loralyn Lyndy**, extinguishing the last bit of fight the Narwhals had. By the time the game ended, the Cliffside Pitch looked more like a battlefield than a sports arena. The Narwhals were battered, bruised, and beaten in their own backyard. ‚ö∞Ô∏èüåä

So there you have it, folks! **The Greenwatch wins 4-0!** A terrible day for the North, but a glorious day for violence! **Sir Randy** can keep his fancy bow; his team has fists of steel! This is **Nok the Corrupter**, signing off and reminding you: It‚Äôs not about winning or losing, it‚Äôs about how many people you send to the Healer! Goodnight, Osterra! üåôüëπ
